issue.title: [C++] Add initial microbenchmarks for Dataset internals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11877](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11877). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A quick investigation of ARROW-11781 showed much of the overhead lies in evaluating partition expressions against the filter. While much of this is just kernel evaluation, we should have benchmarks of key Datasets internals like SimplifyWithGuarantee.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11877?focusedCommentId=17298922) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9638
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9638>
